name: System Siege
detailed_description:
It's all out war and it's either us, or them. Humans, or Androids. After the fallout at the Android rights bill signing in Whitfield we've been scrambling to destroy all the technology we've spent centuries making.

Battle as different commanders in System Siege, a tactical turn-based strategy to defeat the androids and win not only the planet back, but the entire solar system.

Current Features
  • Play on a grid layout with different units and terrain
  • 3 playable commanders with different playstyles
  • 1v1 online and local multiplayer
  • 6 unit types and 10 terrain types with 5 different maps
